menu.name: Nostalgic Funkin'
menu.desc: Options for Nostalgic Funkin. Includes options for indievidual mods.

checkbox.desc: If unchecked, flashing lights for mods such as Vs Tricky, Vs Void (notbeep support this pls) etc will be disabled.
checkbox.name: Flashing Lights

checkbox.desc: Changes the UI into an older version Kade Engine.
checkbox.name: Kade Engine UI

checkbox.desc: Gives the strum notes higher frames to mimick KE's bot note presses. Kade Engine UI option must be enabled for this to work!
checkbox.name: Faster note press

checkbox.desc: Use the Old Nostalgic Funkin Logo.
checkbox.name: Old Logo
